issue.title: [C++] Create benchmark for file iteration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13015](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13015). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's plenty of subtlety involved in a task as simple as iterating through a file.  For example, there are Linux calls fadvise / readahead.  Buffered iteration vs regular iteration.  Block size.  Hot/cold cache.  We could use a benchmark to help explore the effect of some of these options.
